text:
Sound technicians shall by responsible for conducting tests and investigations relating to noise levels and compliance with 
Article 29 of the San Francisco Police Code as may be necessary or appropriate for the issuance, denial, conditioning, suspension, revocation or transfer of entertainment-related permits; issuing findings, reports and recommendations thereon; and for such other duties as the Executive Director may prescribe. 
(Added by Ord. 164-02, File No. 020783, App. 7/26/2002)
